statusLine.command: input=$(cat); hostname=$(hostname -s); if [ "$hostname" = "Maxi" ]; then location="local"; elif [ "$hostname" = "maxi-server" ]; then location="vps"; else location="$hostname"; fi; current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | sed "s|^/home/maxi|~|"); branch=$(cd "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" 2>/dev/null && git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); printf '\033[2;36m%s\033[0m:\033[2;96m%s\033[0m' "$location" "$current_dir"; if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf ' \033[2;35m(%s)\033[0m' "$branch"; fi; printf ' \033[2;33m%d%%\033[0m' "$pct"; else printf '\033[2;36m%s\033[0m:\033[2;96m%s\033[0m' "$location" "$current_dir"; if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf ' \033[2;35m(%s)\033[0m' "$branch"; fi; fi
